param.name: uuid
param.doc: Unique id of the object to update

method.name: PUT
method.doc: Update a specific logdb object. This can only be used to update the existing object; it cannot be used to create new ones. The sum of all EventsAllocation values in the request must equal 100 for it to be valid.

param.name: Authorization
param.doc: Basic Authentication header

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Request is in JSON formatting

param.name: aclEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for ACL (NAP) Events.

param.name: atpEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for ATP Events.

param.name: ipsEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for IPS Events.

param.name: sysEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for System events.

response.doc:
200 OK ContentType:application/json { "aclEventsAllocation": 40 "atpEventsAllocation": 10 "comment": "Log entries are stored locally on the appliance." "ipsEventsAllocation": 40 "name": "Event Log" "objType": "logdb" "sysEventsAllocation": 10 "uuid": "8f7c0376-d767-4af7-b1f2-0f0d84cfe3d9"
}

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: aclEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for ACL (NAP) Events.

param.name: atpEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for ATP Events.

param.name: comment
param.doc: Comment which describes the object (always the same, but locale dependent).

param.name: ipsEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for IPS Events.

param.name: name
param.doc: Name of the object (always the same, but locale dependent).

param.name: objType
param.doc: Type of the object (always "logdb").

param.name: sysEventsAllocation
param.doc: Percentage (expressed as a whole number 0-100) of the total event storage limit to allocate for System events.

param.name: uuid
param.doc: Unique id of the object.

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: Specified object can not be found

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: ContentType:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting

param.name: message
param.doc: The error message.
